name: FLYING ARROWS 2 demo
description:
Get the full videogame on Kickstarter and be quick: it's just till 29th of May 2023!!
  https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/studioloading/flying-arrows-2-gameboy-game-...

This is how it all continues.

"No more zoos!" the black wolf exclaimed. Everyone knows that the Master of the Beasts has been defeated by the Archer in the legendary Colusseum Battle. Wild animals have been freed from their master by one of their human prisoners. A new balance between wild animals and humans has been finally established.

Even if wild animals were wary of this new civilization, they all decided to work together in peace... or at least to try to. Next to the ExZoo Village there are now a forge, a hospital, a cemetery and a carpenter's shop. Former Veterinary 'Dessa the Healer freed some beasts in the Castle of Fear - right before the Colusseum Battle - and now she helps building the new community. 'Dessa, the mother of the Archer Hero, is resting out of the village, waiting for her son for the daily changing of the guard... when she gets some bad news.

GameBoy players! This is the start of your new adventure!!
